fer

Class Unit

  • java.lang.Object
    • fer.Unit

  • public class Unit
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Evan Stores the properties, state, location, etc. of a particular unit in the game. TODO: Load from XML.

    • Method Detail

      • updateAnimation

        public void updateAnimation()

      • setActiveMapAnimation

        public void setActiveMapAnimation(int animIndex)
        Sets the animation that the unit will pull its map sprite from.
        Parameters:
        animIndex - : The index corresponding to the desired animation. 0 = Idle, 1 = Selected, 2 = Move Up, 3 = Move Down, 4 = Move Left, 5 = Move Right.

      • resetAnimation

        public void resetAnimation(int animIndex)
        Resets the given animation.
        Parameters:
        animIndex - : The index corresponding to the desired animation. 0 = Idle, 1 = Selected, 2 = Move Up, 3 = Move Down, 4 = Move Left, 5 = Move Right, 22 = Reset All.

      • levelUnit

        public void levelUnit(boolean showMenu)

      • getActiveAnimationFrames

        public int getActiveAnimationFrames()

      • getActiveAnimationUpdates

        public int getActiveAnimationUpdates(int frameCount)
        Parameters:
        frameCount - The number of frames to count updates for.
        Returns:
        The number of updates required to traverse the specified number of frames, beginning at frame zero.
